Universities in South Yorkshire

Our Regional Universities

Explore South Yorkshire's leading universities and find the right path for your future studies

Sheffield City Centre & Collegiate Campus

Sheffield Hallam University

A modern university focused on real-world experience and professional career development. Known for strong industry connections and practical learning approaches.

Teaching Excellence
Silver TEF Award for teaching quality
Student Community
30,000+ students from 100+ countries
Modern Facilities
£100m campus investment

Key Highlights

  • Practical, career-focused courses
  • Strong industry partnerships
  • City centre location
  • Professional placements
  • Modern learning facilities
  • Excellent student support
Explore Courses
Sheffield City Centre & Western Bank

University of Sheffield

A world-renowned Russell Group university known for research excellence and innovative teaching. Offering a wide range of courses across multiple disciplines.

World Ranking
Top 100 World University
Research Excellence
92% of research rated world-leading
Global Community
29,000 students from 150 countries

Key Highlights

  • Russell Group member
  • World-class research facilities
  • Award-winning Students' Union
  • Global reputation
  • Research-led teaching
  • Strong graduate prospects
